title: Structural analysis of peptide identified from the 2KRR domain of the nucleolin protein with a c-Myc G4 structure using biophysical and biochemical methods
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22801-22808
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02785J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sarvpreet Kaur, Nikita Kundu, Taniya Sharma, J. Shankaraswamy, Sweta Singh, Sarika Saxena
The stabilization of c-Myc G4 structure is reported by binding of the peptide (derived from the 2KRR domain of the nucleolin protein called the Nu peptide) in the loop region of the G-quadruplex structure by stacking interactions.
